mapper.select:
select count(*) from member_info m, store_product sp, store_order so where m.mem_no = so.mem_no and so.str_pro_no = sp.str_pro_no
and so.str_ord_date >= to_date(#{startSearchDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and so.str_ord_date <= to_date(#{endSearchDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
and m.mem_name like '%'||#{mem_name}||'%'
and sp.str_pro_name like '%'||#{str_pro_name}||'%'

select * from( select rownum r_num, a.* from( select m.mem_no , so.str_ord_no , sp.str_pro_no , m.mem_name , sp.str_pro_image , sp.str_pro_name , sp.str_pro_primecost , so.str_ord_cnt , so.str_ord_addr , so.str_ord_date from member_info m, store_product sp, store_order so where m.mem_no = so.mem_no and so.str_pro_no = sp.str_pro_no
and so.str_ord_date >= to_date(#{startSearchDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and so.str_ord_date <= to_date(#{endSearchDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
and m.mem_name like '%'||#{mem_name}||'%'
and sp.str_pro_name like '%'||#{str_pro_name}||'%'
order by so.str_ord_date desc ) a ) where r_num between #{start} and #{end}
